channel.title: Adding dragon claws spec (4hit)
channel.description: i need help coding d claws to a ddsspeced source ive got them added and got the 2-hit spec but i cant get the 4-hit spec can someoen tell me or give me a guide or something

:countdown untill my birthday 20 days: O.O Cant help it.

item.title: Adding dragon claws spec (4hit)

item.description:

[/quote]
It Might Have Been Asked Dozens Of Times, But Its Never Been Answered Nor Had A Tut Made.[/quote] Although, it has been answered and explained briefly on how to do it, and many sources have the full dragon claw specials in it, try taking those codes out, and palcing them in yours.
